entities.name: rufus scrimgeour
entities.description: Rufus Scrimgeour is mentioned as the Minister for Magic, and Luna claims he is a vampire. This is based on an article written by Luna's father that was not published due to Ministry interference.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as the one who claims Rufus Scrimgeour is a vampire, and she repeats her father's bizarre views as fact.

entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: Cornelius Fudge is mentioned as the previous Minister for Magic who was replaced by Rufus Scrimgeour.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn's office is mentioned, and Harry and Luna are approaching it with sounds of laughter, music, and loud conversation growing louder.

relationships.description: Luna claims that Rufus Scrimgeour is a vampire, based on an article written by her father.
Cornelius Fudge was replaced as Minister for Magic by Rufus Scrimgeour.
